channel.title: Most Realistic driving game?
channel.description: Just wondered what the most realistic driving game is... i dont mean racing.. i mean like one where you can just drive about do anything you like.. use indicators (signals) get chased by cops... etc something like GTA but more realism with real cars and good graphics

item.title: Most Realistic driving game?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:32, topic:182869”][quote author=cooper link=topic=244562.msg2078140#msg2078140 date=1204249713]
Hard Truck: 18 Wheels of Steel
I was browsing a warez site and saw this. Maybe it could be modded to run normal cars?
It LOOKS like a free roam.
EDIT
Also, make sure you have a wheel/pedals for realism. For more realism, get this:
http://www.vuzix.com/iwear/products_vr920.html
It is cheap in its market, pretty good quality, and it makes the game much more real, especially if you take advantage of the stereoscopic 3d mode.
[/quote]

I have it already… Its just basicly a long distance HGV game. You deliver goods all over the us[/quote]
Okay, well I’m sure someone has made a freeware game like this. Check the DigiPen website, they might have something like this.

Check this video maybe:

www.fullgames.sk

Off Road

In Off Road you will drive through caves, cross rivers, dart through valleys etc. You can see it in this trailer.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Realistic driving game?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Hard Truck: 18 Wheels of Steel
I was browsing a warez site and saw this. Maybe it could be modded to run normal cars?
It LOOKS like a free roam.
EDIT
Also, make sure you have a wheel/pedals for realism. For more realism, get this:
http://www.vuzix.com/iwear/products_vr920.html
It is cheap in its market, pretty good quality, and it makes the game much more real, especially if you take advantage of the stereoscopic 3d mode.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Realistic driving game?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Rajae:

There can’t be sex in any game. If there was sex, then it would be rated Adults Only. Sony Computer Entertainment America states “PlayStation does not publish Adults Only games.”

18+ games count as adult games.

Read full topic

I guess you have to race to school, and win street races in life.

Well you don’t have to, thats more like a minigame.
Life is… a life simulator
[/quote]

If you dont have out good to say please dont post…[/quote]
Sorry, I was replying to his post. I’ll try to stay more on topic :P.
Also, there are mods for MSFSX that allow you to drive cars and stuff. They seemed pretty realistic, not graphically really, but still realistic.
